last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 20
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gun and Mi Young had a great time together and what happened in Macao was about to take place for the second time.

name: Fated to Love You
overview: The hard working, kind and timid Kim Mi Young has little in the way of education, beauty or wealth, but all that changes after a fateful night of accidental passion with the spoiled, rich heir of a family company, Lee Gun. Her insignificant existence completely transforms when she finds out she is pregnant and must tie her life to his in a shot-gun wedding. The couple decides to make the best of a bad situation, but just when Lee Gun begins to show his growing affection for Kim Mi Young, his first love re-enters the picture to stake her claim.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Lee Gun who is a successful businessman was ready to propose to Sera, his girlfriend. Then he met a girl named Kim Mi Young.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Fallen into a trap, Gun and Mi Young drank beverages with drugs in it. Then they somehow entered the same hotel room.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Mi Young was shocked that she was pregnant and, to make matters worse, it was also discovered by her mother.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Having been pressured by their families, Gun and Mi Young decided to get married.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Mi Young was baffled between her mother-in-law who was absolutely sweet and Gun who was very cold to her. At last, she decided to get divorced.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the problem became worse and worse for Gun and Mi Young, Sera, the ex-girlfriend of Gun, came back to Korea.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Gun started to get anxious after seeing Mi Young with Daniel. Meanwhile, Mi Young felt betrayed by Gun.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Gun and Mi Young were perplexed when Sera made a sudden appearance in front of them.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Mi Young started to have more genuine affections with Gun and he as well became more fond of Mi Young.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Divorce papers of Gun and Mi Young's contractual marriage were disclosed to the public by the press.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Collapsed and unconscious momentarily, Gun did not recognize Mi Young and thought Sera as her lover.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Mi Young was absolutely confused with the situation that she decided to leave Korea with Daniel.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Mi Young had the successful debut of her exhibition with Daniel. Gun was completely jealous that she was with Daniel.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Daniel finally found his missing sister and formally proposed to Mi Young.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Encountering Gun, Mi Young asked him not to visit her. But they were to collaborate together at his company.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Gun tried to go out with Mi Young again but Sera became anxious that Mi Young spent time with Gun.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Having decided to leave Korea at once, Mi Young became startled with the news that Gun had been waiting for her for three years.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Mi Young decided to stay by Gun's side. And Gun decided to resign.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Mi Young's mother persuaded Mi Young and Gun in order to break them apart. But all of a sudden, they disappeared.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Gun and Mi Young had a great time together and what happened in Macao was about to take place for the second time.
